text.tspan: # add keys to agent without ssh-add
# "nickname" is now a short alias of this
# log in as this user for this host
type ~ after a newline to begin an escape sequence
tmux keybindings start with Ctrl-B; type Ctrl-B ? for help
default keys are id_rsa, id_ecdsa, and id_ed25519
valid public keys are stored on the server in ~/.ssh/authorized_keys
